app_name_foxyproxy_standard.description: The full name of the FoxyProxy Standard

app_description_foxyproxy_standard.message: Proxy switching by URL, made easy!

app_name_foxyproxy_basic.description: The full name of the FoxyProxy Basic

app_description_foxyproxy_basic.message: Quick on/off proxy switching with no URL patterns

no_settings_found.message: No settings could be found. Please re-install FoxyProxy.
no_settings_found.description: Stored settings not found, not even the default one created at installation.

delete_browser_data_to_not_delete_descri.message: Stored passwords, browsing and form history, download history, webSQL, and server-bound certificates.
delete_browser_data_to_not_delete_descri.description: Description of what is NOT to be deleted

delete_browser_data_to_delete_descriptio.message: Cache, cookies, indexedDB storage, DOM local storage, plugin data, service worker data.
delete_browser_data_to_delete_descriptio.description: Description of what is to be deleted

delete_browser_data_done.description: Message displayed after delete browser data is finished

synchronize_settings_help.message: Turn on to use Firefox Sync (settings are synchronized across all your Firefox browsers). Turn off to store settings locally. Notice you can have two different instances of settings, one sync and one local.

mode_patterns_and_priority.message: Use Enabled Proxies By Patterns and Priority
mode_patterns_and_priority.description: Switching mode that uses white and black patterns as you have ordered them

mode_disabled.description: Completely disable FoxyProxy and revert to using Firefox proxy settings, if any

mode_dedicated.message: Use proxy %title for all URLs (ignore patterns)
mode_dedicated.description: Use selected proxy for all URLS, regardless of any patterns
